t: 50+ Amazon Sourcing Agent: Develop Your Private Label Brand
s: Amazon FBA sourcing agents have to get updated on the manufacturing process and know the production timeline for your products. You are allowed to ask for updates from the manufacturer to ensure a smooth operation. You have to know your assembly line and make a good business schedule.
